messages.subject: Unschooling or parenting list?
messages.msgSnippet: ... I don t understand this.  Unschooling is the way I parent, or, my parenting style is unschooling. I cannot differentiate.  Anything to do with parenting
messages.messageBody:
At 05:47 AM 10/25/02 +0000, Tangie wrote:
>This list has, to me, appeared to be more of a general parenting
>list. The volume of posts is remarkable, but few of them have
>anything to do with unschooling. Maybe the name of the group should
>be changed.

I don't understand this. Unschooling is the way I parent, or, my parenting
style is unschooling. I cannot differentiate. Anything to do with
parenting has to do with unschooling if you are living an unschooling life.

But blech, how I hate using a word that both has "school" in it and defines
my life with a negative.

Donna Andrea
